description:
A little extra protection for one of your most invaluable pieces of kit. Keep your headlamp safe and sound in this little case. Semi-rigid design is easy to pack around but still offers sufficient protection for your light’s controls and optics.

  • Inner mesh pocket on the lid provides a secure spot to keep backup batteries
  • Nylon hang loop lets you attach this case to your pack, harness and almost anywhere else
  • Dimensions: 11.5 x 8 x 5.6cm
  • Works with: HL10, HL12R, HL15, HL16, HL18R, HL23, HL26R, HL30, HL32R, HL35, HL40R, HL50, HM50R, HL55 and HL60R
name: Fenix Headlamp Case
